body: Fake it till you make it - the hentai.

That woman's way of thinking is just absolutely retarded. "Hurr Durr he looks good and wears branded clothes, I'll give my virginity and everything else to him" yeah sure, you'll be signing away your life. Its what creates broken thrown away women on the streets. The guy is kinda stupid too, if you wanna get serious, then at least fix yourself and be aware of how you are. Both of them fucktards.

So so so good. I normally hate time skips but this one was well done. It made sense everything FMC had believed up to that point had all been a lie, and she’d be understandably outraged. So the time to vent in all these other ways, cool down, then really get a chance to see the MC for who he is and how he’s grown was a good decision. I get it sucks she then went out with a whole lot of men, but I also feel it makes sense in terms of the story. And again MC was the one in the wrong. She went to find the “real” Shou, but couldn’t. MC was Shou+his flaws+all the other things that make him who he is. Also, I like his hair at the end so much. It looks better than his Afro and long straight hair. The short curly hair gives him a real cool and mature feel. But it feels earned over the course of the story.
eh haven't read this in a long time but idk if i would hook back up with her
well at least it is a happy endig
yep,she was banged by a whole lot of man!
That ending where she talks about banging like 30 guys in a year and then runs back to him gave me cancer
